metadata.name: Choice
metadata.description:
This is the title of a play on words in Japanese.
In Japanese, the words "choice" and "washing" are both read as "SENTAKU".

In my work I have tried to reflect on the idea that "choosing life" means killing yourself when you could have made a different choice every minute and every second.
There are many motifs scattered throughout the piece, so please look for them and think about the story.



「選択」と「洗濯」を掛けた言葉遊びの題名です。

「人生の選択」とは、一分一秒ごとに別の選択をしていたはずだった自分を殺すという事なのではないか、という私なりの考察を作品に込めました。
色々なモチーフを作品に散りばめたので、是非探しながらストーリーを考えて見て下さい。
